Band Ieuenctid Cymru 100 Entertainments Contest Band Cymru - Finals band-ieuenctid-cymru
Youth
Parc & Dare Theatre, Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK 1st Edition
Following a series of auditions, four bands have been picked to compete in the brand new, separate competition for musicians under 18 years of age, Band Ieuenctid Cymru (Wales Youth Band), with Â£1,000 up for grabs.
also Finalists: Band Jazz Tryfan, Gwent Youth Wind Orchestra, Cardiff and Vale Music Service Youth Jazz Orchestra
